subtitleNullable: normal and covid-19 affected chest x-ray images
descriptionNullable:
### Context

To identify COVID-19 patient..


### Content

This dataset contains the chest X-ray images of C)VID-19 affected people and the Normal people.

### Acknowledgements

This dataset is the combined and modified version of [COVID-19 chest xray](https://www.kaggle.com/bachrr/covid-chest-xray) and [chest-xray-dataset](https://www.kaggle.com/alifrahman/chestxraydataset) datasets.


### Inspiration

The main inspiration behind creating this dataset is to identify COVID-19 affected patients efficiently.
